data.caption: Closure of Trading Window
data.news_body: Pursuant to the provisions of SEBI( Prohibition of Insider Trading) Regulations 2015 as amended please note that trading window for dealing in securities of the Company will remain closed from Thursday 1st January 2026 till 48 hours after the declaration of financial results for the quarter and nine months ended on 31st December 2025. Accordingly all designated persons and their immediate relatives are advised not to trade insecurities of the company during the aforesaid period of closure of trading window.

data.caption: Extension Of Commercial Date Of Operation
data.news_body:
We want to inform you that the indicative time for completion of acquisition and commercial operation shall be on or before 31st March 2026 due to delay in executing the project on the part of Emerge Solar One Private Limited.

Kindly take the same on your record.

data.news_body: Pursuant to the Regulation 30 (read with Part A of Schedule III) and Regulation 33 of the SEBI (Listing Obligations and Disclosure Requirements) Regulations 2015 ("Listing Regulations") we hereby inform you that the Board of Directors of the Company at its meeting held today i.e. on 08th August 2025 which commenced at 3:40 P.M. and concluded at  6:20 P.M. considered and approved Unaudited Financial Results for the Quarter ended on 30th June 2025 along with Limited Review Report issued by Statutory Auditors.

data.caption: Revision In Indicative Time For Completion Of Acquisition
data.news_body:
This is continuation of our intimation dated 8th November 2024 regarding approval by the Board of Directors to the proposal to 26% of equity in Emerge Solar One Private Limited. The indicative time for completion of acquisition was mentioned on or before six months.

In this regard we want to inform you that there is a revision in indicative time period for completion of acquisition . The revised time period for completion of acquisition is 30th September 2025.

Kindly take the same on your record.

data.caption: Update on board meeting
data.news_body: The Board Meeting to be held on 22/05/2025 has been revised to 26/05/2025 The Board Meeting to be held on 22/05/2025 has been revised to 26/05/2025

data.caption: Board Meeting Intimation for 1) Audited Financial Results For The Quarter And Year Ended On 31St March 2025 And 2) Recommend Final Dividend If Any For The Financial Year 2024-25.
data.news_body:
Sahyadri Industries Ltdhas informed BSE that the meeting of the Board of Directors of the Company is scheduled on 22/05/2025 inter alia to consider and approve 1) Audited Financial Results for the Quarter and Year ended on 31st March 2025.

2) The recommendation of Final Dividend if any for the Financial Year 2024-25. If the Final Dividend is recommended by the Board of Directors the Book Closure and Record Date for the purpose of payment of the same will be determined later and will be communicated to the stock exchange separately.

data.caption: Announcement under Regulation 30 (LODR)-Analyst / Investor Meet - Intimation
data.news_body: Please refer to our intimation dated 12th September, 2024 regarding Analyst/ Institutional Meeting on 26th September, 2024 pursuant to the Regulation 30 read with Schedule III (Part A) (15) of the SEBI (Listing Obligations and Disclosure Requirements) Regulations, 2015.We wish to inform you that the said meeting of Analysts/ Investors (Participants) dated 26th September, 2024 is rescheduled as below. Date: September 27, 2024  Time of Interaction: 01:00 PM to 02:00 PM Particulars of Investor Event/ Meeting: Group Meeting Mode of Meeting: Through Video Conferencing / Other Audio-Visual Means.This is to further inform that the Company will be referring to all the publicly available documents for the discussions.Kindly note that changes may happen due to exigencies on the part of Participants / Company.

data.news_body: SAHYADRI INDUSTRIES LTD.has informed BSE that the meeting of the Board of Directors of the Company is scheduled on 07/08/2024 ,inter alia, to consider and approve Pursuant to the Regulation 29 of the Securities Exchange Board of India (Listing Obligations and Disclosure Requirements) Regulations, 2015, we wish to inform you that, Meeting of Board of Directors of the Company scheduled to be held on Wednesday, 07th August 2024, inter alia to consider and approve Unaudited Financial Results for the quarter ended on 30th June, 2024.Further to inform you that, in compliance with provisions of SEBI (Prohibition of Insider Trading) Regulations, 2015 and as per Code of Conduct of the Company under the SEBI Prohibition of Insider Trading Regulations, 2015, the Trading Window for dealing in the securities has been closed for all Directors/Officers/Designated Persons/Connected Persons of the Company from 01st July, 2024 upto 48 hours after the declaration of financial results of the Company i.e., 09th August 2024 (both days inclusive) for the Quarter ended on 30th June, 2024.

data.caption: Unaudited Financial Results For The Quarter And Nine Months Ended On 31St December, 2022
data.news_body:
Pursuant to the Regulation 30 (read with Part A of Schedule III) and Regulation 33 of the SEBI (Listing Obligations and Disclosure Requirements) Regulations, 2015 (Listing Regulations) we hereby inform you that, the Board of Directors of the Company, at its meeting held today i.e. on 04th February, 2023, which commenced at 03.30 P.M. and concluded at 04.30 P.M. considered and approved the following:

1) Unaudited Financial Results for the Quarter and Nine months ended on 31st December, 2022 along with Limited Review Report issued by Statutory Auditors.

2) Interim Dividend of INR 2.5 per Equity Share of INR 10 each for Financial Year 2022-23. The Interim Dividend would be paid to members whose names appear on the Register of Members and the beneficial owners as on the Record Date i.e. Wednesday, 15th February 2023.
